content.raw:
I've made all my recommended changes here: eb98d70

I still have two open questions:
 - [Why ZEROMQ_FOUND?](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/17/find-modules-needed-for-ignition-transport/activity#comment-50975915)
 - [Do we need these variables?](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/17/find-modules-needed-for-ignition-transport/diff#comment-50976641)

Those concerns are pretty minor, so I'd be okay with merging this and then addressing those questions later if this PR is blocking anyone.
